SKILLS

Competence & Experience

Since I started my journey developing websites nearly 5 years ago, I’ve done work for a marketing agency, a startup, local businesses, I’ve been a project owner and collaborated with people to create web products for both business and consumer use.

I create easy to use, responsive websites. The main area of my expertise is front-end development, HTML, CSS, JS and ReactJS.

I also have experience with the popular CMS WordPress, UX design with Figma and back-end with Express.js.

Visit my LinkedIn profile or check out my Github.
